Name: tsmax
Definition: maximum daily air temperature (tmax) below which all precipitation is assumed to be snow

Name: trmax
Definition: tmax above which all precipitation is assumed to be rain

Name: DKmax
Definition: difference between the maximum and the minimum melting rates

Name: prof
Definition: snow cover threshold for snow insulation

Name: tminseuil
Definition: minimum temperature when snow cover is higher than prof

Name: tmaxseuil
Definition: maximum temperature when snow cover is higher than prof
